Class QueryWhere<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.h2.jaqu.QueryWhere<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the return type
public class QueryWhere<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a query with a condition.

select

public <X,Z> java.util.List<X> select(Z x)
Performs the select of the query. Returns the results or an empty list. Does not return null. This select returns a List of a given object that mapping is given to from the result set to the field in that object

select

public java.util.List<T> select()
Perform the built query Select.

Returns:
List can be a list of one, many or empty, never 'null'. Can be used in a primary key select, but using selectFirst(Z) is advised.

selectFirst

public T selectFirst()
Select the first result and return it. Should also be used in a primary key select.

Returns:
T result or null if there is no result
